name: Filipino Community Center (FCC)
description: The Filipino Community Center (FCC) provides programs and services that allows community members to access free and low-cost resources. The FCC connects families to grassroots organizations and advocates through Family Support Services (FSS). FSS offers free case management & referrals for the following fields: - Employment Support - Job search and resume writing - Immigration Needs & Education - Referrals for legal consultations and questions on citizenship, family petitions, and immigrant righ
